testimonial-1: It's good. There are so many cool stickers!
testimonial-2: Contains beautiful stickers. Must share it with friends.
testimonial-3: My favourite! These stickers are genius. Superb!
disclaimers: By subscribing to 'Buzz2mobile' services, you will get to enjoy unlimited mix content such as games, videos, apps, wallpapers and many more. For Etisalat, you will be charged AED 11/week, and new users will enjoy 1 day free trial. For Du, you will be charged AED 12/week. Subscription will be automatically renewed until you unsubscribe from the service. To unsubscribe, for Etisalat send C BZ to 1111. For Du, send UNSUB BZ to 9934. To use this service, you must be more than 18 years old and must have received permission from your guardian or parents who is authorized to pay your mobile bills.
sense-of-humour: You've got a good sense of humor
enter-phone-number: Enter your phone number to get all the sticker packs.
express-emotions: Now you can express your emotions with the amazing stickers. Have fun!
